My name is Jiayu Chen é™ˆå˜‰é©­, and Iâ€™m a research assistant with a passion for genomics, RNA-seq, and emerging omics technologies. I’m currently based in Uppsala, Sweden, where I work on developing novel RNA sequencing techniques to better understand cellular diversity and gene regulation.
